description:
Check out my other course (Learn to Create Professional Websites from a Kid), teaching you weebly and many other skills, it is the same price as this course!

******* Get more than 50% off all my courses if you sign up at rahulj .com! ********

In this course you will learn how to build amazing, responsive websites in minutes with weebly!

Each of these sections will be taken by a step-by-step approach, and will allow you to learn by doing, and not just by watching, therefore maximising your learning.

In this course i will go over every feature in Weebly and we will create amazing websites together.

What will you gain from this course?

  • You will be able to build professional and responsive websites for free and put them on the internet
  • You will be able to create a professional website in 5 minutes
  • You will know Weebly and Basic HTML and CSS
  • You will be able to create professional stores, blogs and normal sites

How long will this course take?

This course is over 3 hours long and consist of 25 lectures. Each lecture is explained in good detail so you will be able to make sense of everything.

Who is this for?

This course is for anyone aged 10 and above. And is for everyone, no matter what skill level you are, this is a very simple course but the outcome is something of a professional standard. This course does not require any coding knowledge.

So enroll this course and have your website up in minutes, if it isn’t for you, then there is a 30 day money back guarantee.

*** Write a review and get some highly rated additional information ***

What do you need?

  • Access to the internet
  • No coding knowledge
  • A computer / laptop / desktop

******* Get more than 50% off all my courses if you sign up at rahulj .com! ********

Rahul Jindal. Developer. Designer. Entrepreneur.
title: Learn to Build Professional Weebly Websites from a Kid
